name: NONHUMAN RIGHTS PROJECT
description: Nonhuman Rights Project is a civil rights organization that fights for animal rights
sampleDescriptions: Support for the SWIMS Act (as introduced by Diane Feinstein), educating staffers and Members about the relationship between animal welfare law and animal rights law, finding common ground.
Support for the SWIMS Act, as introduced by Diane Feinstein and Adam Schiff. Explaining the relationship between animal rights law and animal welfare law for staff and members, and looking for common
